Package net.apartium.cocoabeans.security.totp

Interface CodeVerifier

@AvailableSince("0.0.25") public interface CodeVerifier
Use this interface to verify if the given totp code is valid (it's safe against timing attacks)
See Also:
  • Timing Attack

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static CodeVerifier
    create(CodeGenerator codeGenerator, TimeProvider timeProvider)
     
    static CodeVerifier
    create(CodeGenerator codeGenerator, TimeProvider timeProvider, int timePeriod, int allowedTimePeriodDiscrepancy)
     
    boolean
    isValidCode(String secret, String attemptCode)
    Use this method to check if the given code is valid (it's safe against timing attacks)

  • Method Details

    • create

      static CodeVerifier create(CodeGenerator codeGenerator, TimeProvider timeProvider)
      Parameters:
      codeGenerator - which code generator to use
      timeProvider - which time provider to use
      Returns:
      the created code verifier

    • create

      static CodeVerifier create(CodeGenerator codeGenerator, TimeProvider timeProvider, int timePeriod, int allowedTimePeriodDiscrepancy)
      Parameters:
      codeGenerator - which code generator to use
      timeProvider - which time provider to use
      timePeriod - the time period in seconds (default is 30 sec)
      allowedTimePeriodDiscrepancy - the allowed time period discrepancy in seconds (default is 1) Note if it's 1 it will check 30 seconds before and ahead of the current time)
      Returns:
      the created code verifier

    • isValidCode

      boolean isValidCode(String secret, String attemptCode)
      Use this method to check if the given code is valid (it's safe against timing attacks)
      Parameters:
      secret - The shared secret key to generate the code with
      attemptCode - The n-digit code given by the user
      Returns:
      True if the code is valid, else false
